speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Jordan Smith?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Jordan. What can I help you with?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Jordan. I’m calling regarding your outstanding balance with ABC Credit Union. Before we discuss the account details, could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Can you also confirm your current address for verification?

speaker: Agent
text: I appreciate your verification, Jordan. You have an outstanding balance of $450. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I’d like to set up a payment plan if possible.

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, we can do that. Would you prefer weekly or monthly payments?

speaker: Customer
text: Monthly payments would work better for me.

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I will set you up with a monthly payment of $75 starting next month. Does that sound good?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, that works for me. Thank you.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for your cooperation, Jordan. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.

speaker: Customer
text: I appreciate your help. Have a good day!

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Jordan. Have a great day!
